text:
As an alternative to Ivanti, there is a product called NinjaOne I've used in the
past. Very flexible, very robust tool for patching, monitoring etc...Allows for
scripting and scheduling updates at a regular cadence. We're looking to
implement this at the company I work for soon.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from laurie082876@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
As an alternative to Ivanti, there is a product called NinjaOne I've used in the
past. Very flexible, very robust tool for patching, monitoring etc...Allows for
